title: How to play a saxophone note for 15 seconds - Quora

response.answer_text: Use your diaphragm when playing. It is a muscle that increases lung capacity by pressing downward. Any good wind player, singer, or athlete should be able to help you with some exercises. When you lie down, your belly should move. Concentrate on maximizing that and minimizing chest movement. Proper breathing will help all your playing, including phrasing, dynamic control, and vibrato.

I can't answer this without knowing the pitch and volume of the note. I personally played a medium high note at a low volume on a clarinet for over a minute. Practice taking very full inhale breaths, play a fairly high soft note and you can improve your skill.
